title: El Greco to Miró: Spanish Paintings at the Art Institute of Chicago Postcard Book
description:
The Art Institute strives to make its collection accessible and engaging by offering visitors—and readers—new ways to experience and enjoy these works. This selection of postcards celebrates the rich tradition and bold invention of artists working in Spain during the 14th through 20th centuries. The postcards feature works including El Greco’s magnificent Assumption of the Virgin, paintings by Spanish Golden Age artists such as Diego Velázquez, Francisco de Goya’s 19th-century canvases, Pablo Picasso’s iconic work The Old Guitarist, a Cubist portrait by Juan Gris, and Surrealist paintings by Joan Miró and Salvador Dalí.

Includes 31 colored postcards.

7 x 4 3/4 x 1/2 in.
